name: HaxBall
description: Alternative style for HaxBall browser game, inspired by the flash version layout.
additional_info: To make the style work, I recommend the Stylus plugin. Stylus Download: Chrome: chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/stylus/clngdbkpkpeebahjckkjfobafhncgmne Firefox: addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/styl-us Opera: addons.opera.com/extensions/details/stylus The principle is the same, you install the plugin and download the style.
